title: hextech crafting
body: Hey riot i thought s rank came after level 5  and now i cannot get a box for my level 5 teemo

replies.body:
The mastery ranks are determined by how often and how well you play (wins will give you more points than losses, higher ranks will give you more points than lower ones). You don't have to be rank 5 with a champion to earn an S rank, you just have to earn an S rank to get a chest.

To get an S rank you have to play better than the vast majority of players on that champion in that position. S+ is the top 2% of scores on that champ in that position.

Mastery 5 has nothing to do with earning chests, you only have to get an S rank on a champion you own, or have someone in your premade get an S while you are playing a champ you own.
